name: minty-dashboard
description: Personal dashboard for Linux Mint with Minty mascot
author: Your Name

scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "PORT=3002 npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 http://localhost:3002 && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.rebuild:native: cd backend && npm_config_runtime=electron npm_config_target=$(node -p "require('../node_modules/electron/package.json').version") npm_config_disturl=https://electronjs.org/headers npm_config_build_from_source=true npm rebuild better-sqlite3 --update-binary
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run rebuild:native && electron-builder
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && npm run rebuild:native && electron-builder --linux
